details: Teams can range from 1 to 5 members.
Open to all with a passion for learning and innovation. Undergraduates, high school programmers, and coding beginners are welcome worldwide. We're here to help you, even if you're new to coding!
Teams are selected as a whole, but individual applications are welcome. You can form a team after being selected.
No problem! Hackofiesta is a great place to learn. Ask our mentors, join our Discord for help, and explore workshops to enhance your coding skills.
Build something aligning with the event theme - a website, software, applet, or even hardware. Anything solving a social problem or fitting our agenda is welcome!
Nope. Fairness first! Work on projects only during Hackofiesta. Familiarize yourself with tools beforehand, but no pre-existing projects allowed.
Explore the Themes Section for project challenges.
Even unfinished projects should be presented! It's a chance to be proud and gain constructive feedback.
Exciting prizes from sponsors for hacks on their APIs/platforms. Keep an eye on the website and social media for more ideas closer to the event.
